author: Seth G. Macy
description: PC gaming is serious business and we'll help you find the right computer desk so you can get to work with winning.

description: As the actor Jared Harris’ film Reawakening arrives on digital, he talks about playing real-life pain versus sci-fi epics like Foundation, how Mad Men impacted his life, and more.

description: A new era.

author: Adam Bankhurst
description: Disney invited us aboard the Heroes and Villains-themed Disney Destiny ahead of its maiden voyage, and we found it to be a stellar achievement for Disney Cruise Line and one of the greatest examples of Disney pushing its storytelling capabilities to a new level. Whether it was Loki taking over the Grand Hall and declaring himself king or Cruella de Vil storming into her own lounge, I felt more a part of these stories I love than ever before.
title: The Heroes and Villains-Themed Disney Destiny Cruise Ship Is Storytelling at Its Finest

author: Michael Cripe
description: Developer Poncle says its newly announced Vampire Crawlers is more of a spinoff than a sequel, but it sounds like Vampire Survivors 2 may actually be in the works, too.
title: Vampire Survivors 2 Not Out of the Question as Poncle Teases It's 'Working on Something'

author: Eric Song
description: Amazon Resale is selling used: like new headphones for under $250 (normally $450).

description: Lowest ever prices on individual seasons and full series collections.

description: A better, more powerful Steam Deck.
title: Save $250 Off the Lenovo Legion Go S Z1 Extreme SteamOS Handheld Gaming PC for Black Friday

author: Michael Cripe
description: Godfall developer Counterplay Games reportedly shut down earlier this year, so seeing it suddenly reappear with Armatus, a full-blown roguelite shooter coming to PC and consoles in 2026, might be somewhat of a shock. IGN interviews Counterplay to find out more.
title: Godfall Developer Counterplay Games Talks Shutdown Reports as First Trailer for Armatus Hits the Internet

author: Michael Cripe
description: Lyrical Games and Plot Twist have revealed Erosion, a twin-stick roguelike set in a post-apocalyptic wild west that is set to launch into early access early next year.
title: Erosion Trailer Reveals Breakneck Twin-Stick Shooter from Studio Behind The Last Case of Benedict Fox

author: Eric Song
description: Best deal I've seen for a RTX 5080 prebuilt gaming PC, let alone a tiny one.
title: Cooler Master NR2 RTX 5080 Miniature Gaming PC Drops to $1899, Will Sell Out Before Black Friday

author: Michael Cripe
description: Indie developer Cococucumber is, for the first time ever, trying its hand at a sequel with Echo Generation 2. IGN interviews the team to find out why.
title: Cococucumber Talks '80s Inspirations and Turn-Based Cosmic Horror as Echo Generation 2 Is Finally Revealed

description: Get up to $250 in Apple gift cards, starting on November 28.

description: Tonight's Xbox Partner Preview showcase has now concluded, and we've got a fresh list of new day one Xbox Game Pass launches to look forward to.

author: Michael Cripe
description: Panik Arcade has announced its popular rogue-lite slot machine horror game, CloverPit, is getting an Xbox Series X | S version, and it’s out today.
title: CloverPit Brings Slot Machine Horror to Xbox Today With DLC Planned for the Future

author: Michael Cripe
description: Bloodborne and Hollow Knight-inspired Metroidvania Crowsworn is back with a new gameplay trailer confirming plans to (eventually) launch for PC and consoles.

author: Michael Cripe
description: The Mound: Omen of Cthulhu materialized at the Xbox Partner Preview to deliver the news that it’s coming to PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X | S summer 2026.

author: Michael Cripe
description: Oro Interactive and Cybernetic Walrus will let groups of four go undercover as gas station aliens when Roadside Research launches for PC and Xbox Series X | S early next year.
title: Roadside Research Adds Xbox Platforms as Gas Station Alien Chaos Nears Early 2026 Launch

author: Michael Cripe
description: Apogee and Trigger Happy made an appearance at the Xbox Partner Preview to announce their first-person psychological horror game, Total Chaos, doesn’t just have a release date – it’s actually out today.
title: Total Chaos Surprise Launch Brings Psychological Horror to PC and Consoles Today

author: Michael Cripe
description: Hitman has seen Agent 47 face a rogue’s gallery of guest stars, but he may only have one shot to take out a notorious hip hop alter ego in the next elusive target mission, Eminem vs. Slim Shady.

description: The CRKD Gibson SG Guitar Controller
title: CRKD Has Revived the Gibson SG Guitar Controller

author: Michael Cripe
description: TiGames is keeping up its animal antics with the latest gameplay trailer for Zoopunk, a third-person action game coming to PC and consoles in 2027.

author: Michael Cripe
description: Tides of Annihilation showed up for today’s Xbox Partner Preview to give fans a lengthy boss fight to chew on while they wait for a release date.
title: Tides of Annihilation Gameplay Delivers Full Boss Fight as the Wait for a Release Date Continues

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Today's Xbox Partner Presents concluded with a seriously epic cinematic trailer for a new game that caught me totally off guard. It's called Raji: Kaliyuga, and it's a sequel to Raji: An Ancient Epic.
title: Raji: Kaliyuga Announced as a Cosmic Sequel to Raji: An Ancient Epic

author: Michael Cripe
description: James Bond is known for his slick gadgets and driving skills, and today’s Xbox Partner Preview trailer shows how 007 First Light will let players use both to get the job done.

author: Eric Song
description: Lowest prices ever on the Arc and Arc Ultra soundbars, Era 100 speaker, and more.

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Reanimal, the upcoming co-op horror game from the creators of Little Nightmares, now has a release date announced at the Xbox Partner Presents. It's coming out on February 13, 2026 for Xbox, PC, PS5, and Nintendo Switch 2.
title: Reanimal, the New Co-Op Horror From the Devs of Little Nightmares, Is Out in February, With a Free Xbox Demo Out Now

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Vampire Survivors is getting...a sequel? A spin-off? Well, another game, made by Poncle. It's called Vampire Crawlers, and it's a first-person, roguelike, deck builder dungeon crawler that has all the addictive sound effects and visuals of Vampire Survivors.
title: Vampire Survivors Is Getting a Spin-Off, And It's Totally Not a Roguelike Deckbuilder (It Is)

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: White Sky might just be the perfect comic for fans of The Last of Us. Find out why in our exclusive preview.

description: Marvel's epic One World Under Doom crossover ends with a major death and a new character being crowned Sorcerer Supreme. Here's everything you need to know about the finale.

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: A major Borderlands 4 update has dropped today, November 20. Check out the patch notes to find out what's changed.
title: Major Borderlands 4 Update Adds Smarter Loot Drops, a New Legendary Loot Indicator for the Radar, and a Lot More

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Everyone who is making The Odyssey with Christopher Nolan seems to be taking their job exactly as seriously as they should — especially Tom Holland, who called the head of Sony during filming for Nolan’s epic so he and the cast could screen a 70mm print of the classic film Lawrence of Arabia during production.
title: Matt Damon Revealed Tom Holland Called Sony To Arrange 70mm Screening of a Movie Classic For The Odyssey Cast

author: Michael Cripe
description: Microsoft will soon dive into the November 2025 Xbox Partner Preview as Xbox Series X | S closes out the year with a brand-new showcase.

author: Tom Phillips
description: Disney's decision to make a fifth Toy Story film has been defended by its director, who has said that fans of Pixar's original trilogy can simply "have that and never watch another if they don't want to."
title: 'Nobody's Being Robbed Of Their Trilogy': Toy Story 5 Director Defends Disney's Decision To Make Yet Another Sequel

description: Apple's AirPods Pro 3 have dropped to their lowest price yet of $219.99 at Amazon, Best Buy, and Walmart as Black Friday sales start up.

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Friends fans, this is major news for you. Listen up. Matt LeBlanc’s classic spinoff series Joey has just released a whopping eight unaired episodes — over 20 years after the show was cancelled.
title: Friends Spinoff Joey Randomly Releases 8 Never-Before-Seen Episodes of the Short-Lived Series on YouTube

author: Robert Anderson
description: Xbox's 2025 Black Friday sale is officially now live, and includes deals on games, controllers, and more. However, it's also notably lacking any discounts on Xbox consoles, or Xbox Game Pass Ultimate.

author: Tom Phillips
description: It's happening — the brilliant Silent Hill 2 Remake is finally arriving on Xbox Series X/S, and it's being released with a hefty 50% launch discount.
title: Surprise! Silent Hill 2 Remake Shadow Drops on Xbox Series X/S With 50% Launch Discount

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Amazon has announced its latest attempt to use generative AI: to add a Video Recaps service for previous seasons of popular shows on Prime Video.

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The Hunger Games: Sunrise on the Reaping has its debut trailer, showing off a first look at the next entry in the long-running franchise exactly a year before launch.

author: Hannah Hoolihan
description: Silent Hill f has received a $20 discount at Best Buy as part of its Black Friday sale, dropping its price from $69.99 to $49.99.
title: Silent Hill f Drops to $50 in Best Buy's 2025 Black Friday Sale

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: October was an incredible debut month for Battlefield 6: it's officially the best-selling title in franchise history in the U.S., and the best-selling game in the U.S. as of last month.
title: Battlefield 6 Just Had the Best Month of Sales in the U.S. of Any Game in the Last Three Years

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Games Workshop is once again expecting big profits despite an expected slowdown in licensing revenue from blockbuster video game Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2.
title: Games Workshop Shares Soar Once Again as Warhammer 40,000 Company Flags Big Profits Despite Expected Space Marine 2 Royalties Slowdown

author: Robert Anderson
description: Amazon has slashed the special edition Pulse Cipher Xbox controller to just $33 for Black Friday, while Microsoft is still trying to sell it for over $59, proving once again that it doesn’t mind overcharging its own fans.
title: Amazon Drops This Xbox Controller to Just $33 While Microsoft is Laughably Still Charging $59

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: PokéPark Kanto is a new, permanent Pokémon theme park opening in Japan next February. Visitors to PokéPark will take on the role of Pokemon Trainers, and explore a town and forest areas designed to bring the anime and games to life. However, those eager to channel their inner Ash Ketchum and “catch ‘em all” may be surprised to discover that strict rules could make a huge portion of the park out-of-bounds for many visitors.
title: Can You Walk Up 110 Steps Without Help? The Pokémon Theme Park in Japan Has Some Strict Safety Rules That Could Exclude Many Visitors

author: Tom Phillips
description: Major gameplay leaks have offered a glimpse at the next era of Fortnite, in which its ever-popular battle royale mode will transition to a fresh map based on the USA.
title: Fortnite Chapter 7 Gameplay Leaks, Suggesting Epic Games Planned to Rival GTA 6 With Its Own New USA-Based Map

author: Vikki Blake
description: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7's co-op Endgame mode will unlock for all players tomorrow, Friday November 21.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7's Endgame Mode Unlocks For All Players Tomorrow, Even If You Haven't Completed the Campaign Yet

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The Steam Machine price debate is ramping up, with a "console pricing model" of $500 looking very unlikely.
title: Don't Expect the Steam Machine Price to Follow a 'Console Pricing Model' of $500

author: Robert Anderson
description: Best Buy's 2025 Black Friday sale is officially live, and you can already save big on Apple AirPods Pro 3, PS5 games, 4K TVs, and more.

author: Tom Phillips
description: As Comet 3I/Atlas whizzes past Earth and Clash of Clans is threatened by a looming asteroid, YouTube scientist Hank Green tells IGN we're detecting more space objects than ever — but should we really be worried?
title: As Comet 3I/Atlas Whizzes Past Earth and Clash of Clans is Threatened By a Looming Asteroid, YouTube Scientist Hank Green Says We're Detecting More Space Objects Than Ever — But Should We Really Be Worried?

description: Marvel will acknowledge the never-ending release of new superhero movies and TV shows in Wonder Man, the latest new superhero TV show of its own.
title: Marvel's 'Self-Aware' Hollywood-Set TV Show Wonder Man Includes 'Commentary About Superhero Fatigue'

author: Tom Phillips
description: The stars of Disney's Frozen franchise will earn an enormous $60 million payout to return for both Frozen 3 and Frozen 4.

description: Embark Studios — the team behind blockbuster hit Arc Raiders — has confirmed it's ending last-gen support for The Finals next year.
title: Arc Raiders Dev to End Support of The Finals' PS4 Version to Focus 'Our Support on Current Generation Hardware'

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The trial that may determine the future of hit video game franchise Subnautica has ended with a number of serious allegations made by Korean mega corp Krafton against the ousted former bosses of developer Unknown Worlds.
title: 'Korea — They Are the Joe Pesci of Countries' — Krafton Alleges Former Subnautica CEO 'Referenced Racist Views Toward Korea and Korean People' as Trial Comes to an End, Drafts in Former BioWare Boss as Expert Industry Witness

description: Dispatch, the superhero workplace comedy from former Telltale devs, has topped two million players.

description: This year's EA Sports FC is down to half price in Amazon's deals, with savings across every version of the game.

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Omelet You Cook, a roguelike cooking game on Steam, has been having a great early access it seems. It recently passed 500 player reviews, and every last one of them was positive, making it one of a rare few games on Steam to have 100% positive reviews. Until today.
title: Cooking Roguelike Game Omelet You Cook Has Its Perfect Steam Review Record Ruined by Contrarian Player
